tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE books (id INT, title VARCHAR(255), genre VARCHAR(50), publication_year INT); 

CREATE TABLE genre_popularity (id INT, genre VARCHAR(50), popularity_score FLOAT, analysis_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE popularity_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    genre_id INT,
    popularity_score FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (genre_id) REFERENCES book_genres(genre_id)
);

CREATE TABLE book_authors (
    book_id INT,
    author_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (book_id, author_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (book_id) REFERENCES books(book_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES author(author_id)
);
